alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 1:46PM EDT until May 21 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lexington County in central South Carolina... Central Richland County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 145 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Five Points, or over Columbia, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, Pine Ridge, Arcadia Lakes, Hopkins, Villages at Sandhill, Columbia International University, Horrel Hill, Killian, Riverbanks Zoo, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park, Columbia Metro Airport and SC State Fair Grounds. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 64 and 85. Interstate 26 between mile markers 107 and 116. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
